entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
